chapter.name: bach Tutorial 8: Real Time Stories
chapter.subhead: Tips, tricks and examples of real-time bach usage
chapter.body: The bach library is designed to be perfectly fitting in the Max/MSP world; thus it is designed to be completely real-time compatible. In this tutorial we give a brief look to some possible real-time applications.
